issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
On instance reboot, the VMWarebroker is not marshalling the response correctly. It looks the the operation does succeed, just that the response may not be delivered as expected. Seeing this on a CLC/SC/CC/broker with 1 NC/ESXi node.

From the cloud-debug.log on vmware-broker:
{code}
Mon Dec 10 14:49:14 2012  INFO [VSphereEndpoint:pool-38-thread-3] [com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpoint.info(VSphereEndpoint.java):16
4] 192.168.51.48: rebooting i-78AA4206
Mon Dec 10 14:49:14 2012 ERROR [Binding:ReplyQueue.16] [com.eucalyptus.binding.Binding.toStream(Binding.java):202] org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException: null value for element "{http://eucalyptus.ucsb.edu/}status" from object of type com.eucalyptus.broker.EucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType
org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException: null value for element "{http://eucalyptus.ucsb.edu/}status" from object of type com.eucalyptus.broker.EucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType
        at org.jibx.runtime.impl.MarshallingContext.element(MarshallingContext.java:738)
        at com.eucalyptus.broker.EucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType.JiBX_eucalyptus_ucsb_edu_marshal_3_0(VMwareBroker.groovy)
        at com.eucalyptus.broker.JiBX_eucalyptus_ucsb_eduEucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType_access.marshal()
        at com.eucalyptus.broker.EucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType.marshal(VMwareBroker.groovy)
        at org.jibx.runtime.impl.MarshallingContext.marshalRoot(MarshallingContext.java:1021)
        at org.jibx.runtime.impl.MarshallingContext.marshalDocument(MarshallingContext.java:1041)
        at com.eucalyptus.binding.Binding.toStream(Binding.java:195)
        at com.eucalyptus.binding.Binding.toOM(Binding.java:221)
        at com.eucalyptus.binding.Binding.toOM(Binding.java:216)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.BrokerBindingHandler.outgoingMessage(BrokerBindingHandler.java:153)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.handlers.MessageStackHandler.handleDownstream(MessageStackHandler.java:84)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.sendDownstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:590)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline$DefaultChannelHandlerContext.sendDownstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:796)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.server.ServiceHackeryHandler.handleDownstream(ServiceHackeryHandler.java:110)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.sendDownstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:590)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline$DefaultChannelHandlerContext.sendDownstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:796)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.server.ServiceContextHandler.handleDownstream(ServiceContextHandler.java:124)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.sendDownstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:590)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.sendDownstream(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:585)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.write(Channels.java:876)
        at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.write(Channels.java:824)
        at com.eucalyptus.context.Contexts.response(Contexts.java:229)
        at com.eucalyptus.ws.util.ReplyQueue.handle(ReplyQueue.java:84)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor384.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:616)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.AbstractEntryPointResolver.invokeMethod(AbstractEntryPointResolver.java:147)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.ReflectionEntryPointResolver.invoke(ReflectionEntryPointResolver.java:178)
        at org.mule.model.resolvers.DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.invoke(DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.java:50)
        at org.mule.component.DefaultLifecycleAdapter.intercept(DefaultLifecycleAdapter.java:202)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.invokeComponentInstance(AbstractJavaComponent.java:82)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.doOnCall(AbstractJavaComponent.java:73)
        at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.onCall(AbstractComponent.java:87)
        at org.mule.model.seda.SedaService$ComponentStageWorker.run(SedaService.java:533)
        at org.mule.work.WorkerContext.run(WorkerContext.java:310)
        at edu.emory.mathcs.backport.java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:665)
        at edu.emory.mathcs.backport.java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:690)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
Mon Dec 10 14:49:14 2012 ERROR [NioServerHandler:ReplyQueue.16] [com.eucalyptus.ws.server.NioServerHandler.exceptionCaught(NioServerHandler.java):191] Internal Error: eucalyptus_ucsb_edu failed to marshall type com.eucalyptus.broker.EucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType with ns:http://eucalyptus.ucsb.edu/ caused by: null value for element "{http://eucalyptus.ucsb.edu/}status" from object of type com.eucalyptus.broker.EucalyptusNCNcRebootInstanceResponseType
{code}
fields.summary: On instance reboot, VMWarebroker is not marshalling the response correctly

comments.body: This ticket relates to VMware. See https://www.eucalyptus.com/eucalyptus-cloud/iaas/compatibility for latest hypervisor compatibility by version.
